related_questions.question:
I.    Arrange the letters into a good order!
(Susunlah huruf-huruf berikut menjadi kata yang tepat tentang
WEATHER AND SEASONS!
1. D-U-Y-L-O-C:........
2. I -N-D-Y - W:.......
3. T-H-O:.......
4. Y-R-I-N-A:......
5. R-E-T-N-I-W:.....​

Soal Ujian Semester Genap    SMAN 3 KARANG BARU
TP. 2020-2021
Mata Pelajaran
Nama
: Bahasa Inggris Peminatan
: Minarti, S.Pd
Kelas/Jurusan :X MIA IIS
Hari/Tanggal :
Pilihlah salah satu jawaban yang paling tepat!
CHOOSE THE CORRECT ANSWER!
The following text is for number 1 to 8
Galileo Galilei (1564-1642) — Astronomer and Scientist. Galileo developed a superior telescope and made
many significant discoveries in astronomy. He was sentenced to life imprisonment by the inquisition for his
support for the Copernican theory that the sun was at the centre of the solar system.
Galileo was born in Florence, Italy in 1564 to a poor but noble family His parents recognized their child's
innate intelligence and talents and so made sacrifices to have him educated. At his father's insistence, Galileo
studied the profitable career of medicine. But, at the University of Pisa, Galileo became fascinated in a wide
range of subjects. He was also critical of many of Aristotle's teaching which had dominated education for the
past 2,000 years.
Galileo was appointed to be a mathematics professor at the University of Pisa, but his strident criticisms of
Aristotle left him isolated among his contemporaries. After three years of persecution, he resigned and went
the University of Padua, where he taught maths. His entertaining lectures attracted a large following and he
able to spend the next 18 years pursuing his interests in astronomy and mechanics.
1. What type of the text above?
A. Narrative.
B. Report.
Biography​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A. Narrative

Teks Me-narasikan Kehidupan Galileo Galilei Dari Tahun 1564-1642, dan Penemuannya Serta Galileo Galilei yang berakhir di penjara. CMIIW

Penjelasan:

Semoga Membantu

related_questions.question: Berikut ini adalah data berat badan dalam kg dari peserta didik kelas VI SD Tentukan diagram batang dari data diatas berat badan tertinggi selisih berat badan tertinggi dengan berat badan rendah​
Kata kerja EAT simple past tanse

answers.answer:
✧˚₊‧୭ Ａｎｓｗｅｒｅｄ　Ｂｙ　ＣｕｔｉｅＢｅａｎ　医ゾの  ୭‧₊˚✧

Eat merupakan bentuk verb 1 atau kata kerja pertama, eat merupakan bentuk irregular verb yaitu kata kerja yang tidak beraturan. Eat memiliki arti makan.

୭ Contoh ୭

• I eat noodle this morning (aku makan mie pagi ini)

• My mom asks me to eat everyday (ibuku menyuruhku untuk makan setiap hari)

• They ask me to eat this food (mereka menyuruhku untuk makan makanan ini)

• I will eat this cake if you ask me (aku akan makan kue ini jika kamu memintaku)

• I will cook for you and you should eat it (aku akan memasak untuk mu dan kamu harus memakan nya)

• We will eat vegetable that my mom picks from the garden (kami akan makan sayuran yang ibuku petik dari kebun)

• They should eat the dishes in the kitchen (mereka harus makan makanan di dapur)

• We will never eat this poison food from you! (kami tidak akan pernah makan makanan beracun ini dari mu!)

— Ate merupakan bentuk verb 2 atau kata kerja kedua dalam bahasa inggris. Ate memiliki arti makan. Ate digunakan untuk bentuk past tense atau lampau.

୭ Contoh ୭

• I ate doughnut last week (aku makan donat minggu lalu)

• We ate kind of vegetables from him last night (kami makan berbagai jenis sayuran darinya malam lalu)

• She ate sate that you bought last morning (dia makan sate yang kamu bawa kemarin pagi)

• We ate that food in her party (kami makan makanan itu di pesta nya)

• They ate meat in that restaurant yesterday (mereka makan daging di rumah makan itu kemarin)

related_questions.question: Di musim kemarau cuacanya a.dingin b.berkabut c.berawan d.berangin​
Sebuah segitiga dengan tinggi 4 cm dan panjang alasnya 9 cm Maka luas segitiga tersebut adalah​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

18 cm²

Penjelasan:

diketahui:

a = 9 cm

t = 4 cm

ditanya: luas segitiga?

jawab:

L = 1/2 x a x t

= 1/2 x 9 x 4

= 18 cm²
